aboutMe: Welcome to my website where I discuss topics I am interested in and keep all my thoughts, Tech related or not, with an emphasis on web development and free and open source software.

I am a backend developer by trade but do have some experience with front-end technologies. I believe in continuously learning and improving my skills to stay updated with the latest trends in web development.

experience.title: Ruby on Rails Developer
experience.description: Working on a legacy Ruby on Rails application which has been being worked on for 12 years, it has a variety of technologies inside, including: Graphql, Kubernetes, AWS-S3, Sidekiq, Redis, Postgres, Seperate Read-write databases and Datadog, Sentry for monitoring

experience.title: Loading Supervisor
experience.description: Supervising the loading of chrome onto trucks, handling both lumpy and fines

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.about: A portfolio website built with Astro and TailwindCSS. With Ruby for scripting, backend free and json files for data storage, built with Svelte, Solidjs, Astro and Vuejs
